title.rendered: Health camp for mother and girl child at Heganahalli

content.rendered: 84 mothers, along with their children, benefitted from the health camp organized at Heganahalli in Bengaluru, Karnataka, under Smile Foundationâ€™s Swabhiman programme. Besides providing medical diagnosis and free medicines, the camp also provided counseling on reproductive health and family planning to the women. Hypertension, hepatitis, child health, malnutrition and diabetes were the most common problems. 15 cases were referred to the nearest government facility. Dr. Shanthi and her team from the KSM Health Centre volunteered their services during the camp.
